content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) for coal storage

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (-20.5, -63.5) storing iron plates

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport Belt network connecting the mining drill to the storage chest

### Iron Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring iron ore to another chest
- Transport Belt network connecting the mining drill to the storage chest

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Full Storage
- Ensure that chests used for storage have enough space to accommodate incoming items. Regularly check and empty full chests to prevent production halts.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source entities for inserters have items available for transfer. Adjust production or supply lines to ensure continuous item flow.

### Errors with Furnaces Lacking Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of ingredients to process. Check the supply chain to identify and resolve any disruptions.

### Errors with Furnace Output Full
- Regularly remove processed items from furnaces to prevent them from halting due to full output slots. Consider using inserters to automate the removal process.
